summary: This is a forwarded email chain from February 2020 discussing scheduling a call between an investigator and a person referred to as 'Mr. [redacted]' who reportedly has new information regarding the Epstein investigation. The primary sender mentions being in LA for Epstein-related matters.

persons.name: Mr. [redacted]
persons.context: An individual who called to speak with investigators regarding the Epstein investigation, reportedly having new information.

events.title: Potential Informant Contact
events.description: A person referred to as 'Mr. [redacted]' contacted someone to speak with investigators, claiming to have new information regarding the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: In February 2020, an individual known as 'Mr. [redacted]' reached out claiming to have new information for investigators regarding the Epstein case.
The email's author states they will be in LA for Epstein-related matters later that week, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
The document is a forwarded email chain, showing communication about coordinating a call between this potential informant and investigators.
